compilation.structure: hook → clip montage with narration → CTA

shorts_facts.visual_style: single image or clip with bold text

tutorial.structure: hook → step-by-step with real examples → recap → CTA

looping_ambient.structure: title card (5s) → music + visual loop (full duration) → fade out + end screen (15s)
looping_ambient.visual_style: seamless looping video or slow-motion AI visuals with channel watermark

original music creation and beat making

genre_swap.name: Genre Swap
genre_swap.description: Take a famous song from one genre and completely remake it in another. Pop songs become rap bangers, rap songs become pop anthems, country goes EDM, etc.
examples: What if 'Shape of You' by Ed Sheeran was a RAP song?
What if 'Lose Yourself' by Eminem was a POP ballad?
What if 'Old Town Road' was an 80s synth track?
What if 'Blinding Lights' by The Weeknd was a COUNTRY song?
What if 'Bohemian Rhapsody' was a TRAP beat?
What if 'Bad Guy' by Billie Eilish was a JAZZ standard?
What if 'Hotline Bling' by Drake was a REGGAE song?
What if 'Rolling in the Deep' by Adele was HIP-HOP?
What if 'Uptown Funk' was a PUNK ROCK song?
What if 'Levitating' by Dua Lipa was R&B?
genre_swap.video_structure: intro (original clip) → breakdown of genre elements → AI remake → side-by-side comparison → outro

era_swap.name: Era Swap
era_swap.description: Take modern hit songs and remake them as if they were produced in a completely different decade. What would today's hits sound like in the 80s? The 50s? The 2000s?
examples: What if 'As It Was' by Harry Styles was made in the 1980s?
What if 'Anti-Hero' by Taylor Swift was a 1960s doo-wop song?
What if 'Flowers' by Miley Cyrus was made in the 1990s?
What if 'Cruel Summer' was a 1970s disco track?
What if 'Paint the Town Red' by Doja Cat was from the 2000s?
What if 'Vampire' by Olivia Rodrigo was an 80s power ballad?
What if 'Espresso' by Sabrina Carpenter was a 50s swing song?
What if 'Greedy' by Tate McRae was made in the 1970s funk era?
What if 'Mockingbird' by Eminem was a 1940s big band song?
What if 'Seven Nation Army' was made in the synth-wave 80s?
era_swap.video_structure: intro (original hit) → era context/history → AI remake in that era → reaction/comparison → outro

music_news.name: Music News
music_news.description: Weekly roundup of music industry news, album drops, artist drama, chart analysis, and trending music topics.

capabilities: Generate full song remakes in different genres
Create era-appropriate instrumentals (80s synth, 90s grunge, etc.)
AI vocal generation for cover versions

style_guides.80s: heavy reverb, gated drums, analog synths, DX7 electric piano, chorus effect on everything
style_guides.90s: grunge guitars, boom-bap drums, R&B slow jams, trip-hop, lo-fi aesthetic
style_guides.70s: funk bass, disco strings, wah guitar, analog warmth, Motown soul
style_guides.60s: surf rock, doo-wop harmonies, Motown, British invasion, psychedelic
style_guides.50s: rockabilly, swing, big band, doo-wop, early rock and roll
style_guides.2000s: crunk, emo pop-punk, R&B with heavy bass, Neptunes production, auto-tune era
style_guides.pop_to_rap: keep melody as hook, add 808s, trap hi-hats, write new verses in rap style
style_guides.rap_to_pop: simplify beat, add pop chord progression, melodic vocal, radio-friendly mix
style_guides.country_to_edm: replace acoustic with synth, add drops, keep storytelling in lyrics
style_guides.rock_to_jazz: reharmonize chords, swing rhythm, add jazz instrumentation

rich_music.thumbnail_style: split-screen original vs remake + genre label + bold text + purple neon glow

listicle.intro:
[HOOK]

Hey, welcome back. Today we're counting down {count} {topic}. Make sure to stick around because number one is genuinely surprising.

Let's get into it.

explainer.intro:
[HOOK]

Today we're breaking down {topic} — what it is, why it matters, and what you need to know.

Let's dive in.

compilation.intro:
[HOOK]

You're about to see {count} incredible {topic} that will blow your mind. Let's not waste any time.

news_recap.intro:
[HOOK]

Here's everything you need to know about {topic} this week.

Let's break it down.

tutorial.intro:
[HOOK]

Today I'm going to walk you through {topic} step by step. By the end, you'll know exactly how to do this yourself.

Let's get started.

[HOOK]

Check out this {product_name} from the Cumquat Vibes store.

{product_description}

Grab yours at cumquatvibes.com — link in the description.

Follow for more drops.

Stop buying {product} until you see this.
{count} tech products you didn't know you needed.
The {year} tech nobody is talking about.
I tested {count} {products}. Only {n} are worth it.

{count} games you NEED to play before you die.
Hidden details in {game} you definitely missed.
Why {game} is the most underrated game ever.

{count} money habits that changed my life.
How to actually build wealth in {year}.
Rich people do this with their money. You don't.
horror: This true story still gives me chills.
{count} unsolved mysteries that keep me up at night.

{count} science experiments that went horribly wrong.

The {topic} truth nobody wants to hear.
This one habit separates winners from losers.
If you're struggling right now, hear me out.
Stop making excuses. Start doing this instead.

{count} manipulation tactics people use on you daily.
Why you can't stop thinking about {topic}.
The psychology trick that controls your decisions.
Dark psychology: {count} signs someone is manipulating you.
default: {count} {topic} facts that will blow your mind.
Everything you know about {topic} is wrong.
The truth about {topic} might surprise you.
You won't believe what we found about {topic}.

emotion_engine.description: ElevenLabs v3 audio tag system for adding emotional expressiveness to voiceovers. Tags are injected into cleaned TTS text before sending to the API.
emotion_engine.model_requirement: eleven_multilingual_v2 or eleven_v3 (v3 has best audio tag support)

storyteller.notes: The storyteller voice works best with tension-building. Use [whispers] for reveals, [pauses] before key moments, ellipses for weight.

neutral_male.notes: Works best with enthusiastic delivery. Use [excited] for big reveals, [curious] for questions, CAPS for emphasis.

calm_narrator.notes: Keep delivery gentle. Use [softly] and [calm] liberally. Ellipses create natural breathing pauses.

energetic_male.notes: Lean into excitement. Use [laughs] for humor, [shouts] for hype, exclamation marks for energy.

friendly_casual.notes: Keep it conversational. Use [laughs] and [cheerfully] to maintain warmth.

warm_female.notes: Warm, empowering tone. Use [confident] for affirmations, [tender] for emotional moments, [cheerfully] for uplifting sections. Always use female voice.

horror.punctuation_style: Heavy use of ellipses (...), rhetorical questions, CAPS for shock moments

psychology.punctuation_style: Strategic pauses before key insights, ellipses for dramatic effect

tech.punctuation_style: Exclamation marks for excitement, CAPS for standout features

ai_tutorial.punctuation_style: Clear delivery, exclamation marks for results, CAPS for tool names

motivation.punctuation_style: Short punchy sentences, ellipses for weight, CAPS for key words

meditation.punctuation_style: Long pauses (ellipses), gentle delivery, minimal exclamation marks

pets.punctuation_style: Warm and playful, exclamation marks for cute moments

finance.punctuation_style: Authoritative delivery, strategic pauses before numbers

post_processing_rules: Insert emotion tags at the START of sentences, not mid-sentence
Never stack more than one emotion tag per sentence
Use [pauses] before major reveals or list item transitions
Use ellipses (...) for natural breathing pauses instead of [pauses] in rapid sections
CAPITALIZE 1-2 key words per paragraph for natural emphasis
Match emotion intensity to voice profile — storyteller gets subtle tags, energetic gets bold ones
For horror/psychology: whisper the hook, build with calm, explode with urgency
For tech/AI: start curious, build excited, land confident
Never use emotion tags inside [VISUAL: ...] directions — those are stripped before TTS
Test with 1-2 tags per paragraph maximum — over-tagging sounds robotic
emotion_engine.gemini_prompt_addon: IMPORTANT: Add ElevenLabs emotion audio tags to make the voiceover more expressive. Use tags like [whispers], [pauses], [excited], [curious], [gasps], [sighs], [confident], [softly], [firmly], [urgently] at the START of sentences to guide vocal delivery. Use ellipses (...) for dramatic pauses. Use CAPS for 1-2 key emphasis words per paragraph. Match the emotional arc: hook with intrigue, build tension/curiosity, deliver with confidence, close with energy. Maximum 1-2 tags per paragraph — don't over-tag.
emotion_engine.integration_notes: The gemini_prompt_addon should be appended to ALL script generation prompts. When scripts are cleaned for TTS, emotion tags [whispers], [excited], etc. should be PRESERVED (not stripped). Only [VISUAL: ...] and [CROSS-PROMO] markers get stripped. The emotion tags become part of the audio output via ElevenLabs v3.

video_templates.description: Reusable video editing templates per niche. Each template defines pacing, transitions, color grading, text overlay styles, and Ken Burns effect parameters. New scripts slot into their channel's template — no starting from scratch.

dark_psychology.broll_prompt_prefix: Cinematic 16:9 aspect ratio, dark moody aesthetic, high contrast, professional video B-roll shot.
dark_psychology.broll_prompt_suffix: Ultra-realistic, photographic quality, no text, no watermarks.
dark_psychology.hook_style: Start with a provocative question or disturbing fact. Whisper delivery.

horror_mystery.broll_prompt_prefix: Cinematic 16:9, horror atmosphere, desaturated colors, deep shadows, eerie lighting.
horror_mystery.broll_prompt_suffix: Photorealistic, unsettling, no text, no gore, psychological horror aesthetic.
horror_mystery.hook_style: Start with a chilling statement. Long pause after hook.

tech_ai.broll_prompt_prefix: Clean modern 16:9, tech aesthetic, neon accents, sleek minimalist design.
tech_ai.broll_prompt_suffix: Professional product photography style, sharp focus, no text, no watermarks.
tech_ai.hook_style: Start with a bold claim or surprising stat. Energetic delivery.

pets_animals.broll_prompt_prefix: Warm natural 16:9, soft lighting, friendly atmosphere, professional pet photography.
pets_animals.broll_prompt_suffix: Photorealistic, heartwarming, cute, no text, no watermarks.
pets_animals.hook_style: Start with a relatable pet owner question. Friendly, conversational tone.

finance_wealth.broll_prompt_prefix: Premium 16:9, luxury aesthetic, dark background, gold accents, professional financial imagery.
finance_wealth.broll_prompt_suffix: Ultra-realistic, sophisticated, no text, no watermarks.
finance_wealth.hook_style: Start with a money-related surprising fact or contrarian take.

motivation_self_help.broll_prompt_prefix: Cinematic 16:9, warm golden hour lighting, inspirational atmosphere, epic landscape.
motivation_self_help.broll_prompt_suffix: Ultra-realistic, inspiring, no text, no watermarks.
motivation_self_help.hook_style: Start with a powerful quote or life-changing realization.

default_template.broll_prompt_prefix: Cinematic 16:9 aspect ratio, professional video B-roll shot.
default_template.broll_prompt_suffix: Ultra-realistic, photographic quality, no text, no watermarks.

production_best_practices.hook: First 3-5 seconds must create a curiosity gap. The viewer should NEED to keep watching.
production_best_practices.pacing: Visual change every 5-10 seconds. B-roll transitions, text popups, zoom cuts.
production_best_practices.retention: Pattern interrupts (sound effects, zoom cuts, text popups) every 15-20 seconds.
production_best_practices.thumbnails: Bold text + high contrast + emotional or curiosity gap. Title and thumbnail work together.

metadata.title: Include primary keyword naturally. Under 60 characters.
metadata.description: Real paragraph with related keywords in first 2 lines. Links below.
metadata.tags: Mix of broad and specific. 8-15 tags.

production_best_practices.posting_schedule: 1-2 videos per week per channel minimum. Consistency beats frequency.
production_best_practices.batch_workflow: Write 4-5 scripts → Record all voiceovers → Generate all B-roll → Assemble all videos. Minimize context switching.

mind_body.cross_promo_cta: Want to unlock your full potential?

tech_ai.cross_promo_cta: Want to stay ahead of the tech curve?

creative_arts.cross_promo_cta: Want to fuel your creative side?

ecosystem.outro_cross_promo_template:
[CROSS-PROMO]

{cross_promo_cta} Check out our sister channel {promo_channel_1} — they just dropped a great video on {promo_topic_1}. And if you're into {promo_niche_2}, {promo_channel_2} has you covered. Links in the description.

And don't forget to subscribe to this channel so you never miss an upload. See you in the next one.

shorts_funnel.shorts_cta_template: Full video on our channel {target_channel} — link in bio.
shorts_funnel.strategy: Use viral Shorts to hook viewers, then drive them to deep-dive long-form content on sister channels

collab_segment_templates: Speaking of {related_topic}, our friends over at {sister_channel} just did an incredible deep dive on this. I'll link it in the description — definitely worth watching after this.
Now if you want to take this even further, {sister_channel} has a whole video breaking down {related_topic}. Check the link below.
This ties directly into something {sister_channel} covered recently. If you're into {related_niche}, you'll want to see that one. Link in the description.

algorithm_boost_strategy.watch_session_chaining: End screens point to sister channel videos to extend watch sessions across the network
algorithm_boost_strategy.comment_engagement: Pinned comments with network links encourage exploration
algorithm_boost_strategy.playlist_strategy: Each channel maintains a 'Network Picks' playlist featuring top videos from cluster channels
algorithm_boost_strategy.upload_coordination: Stagger uploads across cluster channels so related content appears in suggested videos together

hashtag_strategy.note: First 3 hashtags appear above the video title on YouTube. Always lead with #CumquatVibes for network branding.

entry_requirements: Comment your favorite channel in the network

prize_tiers.medium: Cumquat Vibes merch bundle + digital product pack
prize_tiers.large: Full digital course access + merch + 1-on-1 consultation

Welcome to the Cumquat Vibes network — 41 channels, one ecosystem, all the content you could ever want.

[MONTAGE of clips from each channel cluster]

Whether you're into tech, finance, gaming, horror, fitness, cooking, science, or just pure entertainment — we've got a channel for you.

Shop the vibe at cumquatvibes.com. Support us at the link below.

Subscribe to this channel and explore the full network in the description.

Welcome to the vibe.

#CumquatVibes
network_trailer.visual_style: Fast montage of best clips from each channel, channel logos, network map graphic

looping_content_strategy.overview: Create long-form (1-4+ hour) looping content with AI-generated music over looping visuals. Maximizes watch time, ad revenue (more mid-rolls), and provides endless Shorts material when chopped.

ai_music_tools.note: Generate 3-5 min tracks, then loop/crossfade them to fill target duration. Each track should have a consistent vibe so looping feels seamless.

visual_loop_tools.effects: Slow pan, gentle zoom, parallax, particle overlays, color grade shifts

medium.use: Study sessions, workout mixes, sleep sounds

long.use: Full night sleep, all-day work sessions, live-feel compilations

ultra.use: Sleep all night, full workday background

shorts_chopping_pipeline.strategy: Every long-form loop video gets chopped into 15-30 Shorts. Each Short is a 30-60 sec highlight with text overlay identifying the vibe/mood.
shorts_chopping_pipeline.distribution: Spread Shorts across the source channel + cumquat_shortform + related niche channels
shorts_chopping_pipeline.shorts_cta: Full {duration} mix on our channel — link in bio

music.rule: ALL music must be AI-generated via Suno or Udio. Never use copyrighted songs, samples, or melodies.
music.suno_license: Suno Pro/Premier subscribers own generated music commercially. Free tier is non-commercial only.
music.udio_license: Similar commercial rights for paid tiers.
music.verification: Before uploading, run audio through YouTube's Copyright Match preview in Studio. If flagged, regenerate.
music.no_cover_songs: Do NOT generate AI covers of existing copyrighted songs. Even instrumental versions of copyrighted melodies can be flagged.
music.safe_genres: Original compositions in generic genres (lo-fi, ambient, jazz, EDM) are safe. Avoid anything that sounds like a specific copyrighted work.

visuals.rule: Use only AI-generated visuals (Gemini Imagen, Runway) or properly licensed stock footage.
visuals.stock_licenses: Pexels and Pixabay are royalty-free. Storyblocks requires active subscription for license.
visuals.no_movie_clips: Never use clips from copyrighted movies, TV shows, or other YouTube videos.
visuals.ai_generated: AI-generated images and videos are original works and are safe for commercial use.

general.content_id_check: Always preview uploads in YouTube Studio for Content ID matches before publishing.
general.dispute_process: If a false claim occurs on AI-generated content, dispute with proof of AI generation (Suno/Udio generation history).
general.monetization_safety: Only use content you fully own or have explicit commercial license for. One valid copyright strike can demonetize the entire channel.

production_pipeline.step_1: Generate 3-5 min AI music tracks via Suno/Udio matching the mood and genre
production_pipeline.step_2: Loop and crossfade tracks to fill target duration (use ffmpeg for seamless looping)
production_pipeline.step_3: Generate or source looping visuals (AI video via Runway, AI images with pan/zoom, or stock loops)
production_pipeline.step_4: Composite audio + video with ffmpeg (add subtle color grade, vignette, channel watermark)
production_pipeline.step_5: Generate thumbnail (mood visual + text overlay: '3 Hours of Lo-fi Study Beats')
production_pipeline.step_6: Upload to channel with SEO-optimized title, description, and tags
production_pipeline.step_7: Schedule Shorts chopping: extract 20 best 30-60 sec segments with text overlays
production_pipeline.step_8: Distribute Shorts across source channel + cumquat_shortform + related channels
production_pipeline.ffmpeg_loop_command: ffmpeg -stream_loop -1 -i music.mp3 -stream_loop -1 -i visual_loop.mp4 -t {duration_seconds} -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -shortest output.mp4

seo_templates.title: {mood_name} | {genre} | {duration} of {vibe} Music for {activity}
title_examples: Lo-fi Study Beats | 3 Hours of Chill Hip Hop Music for Focus & Concentration
Deep Sleep Meditation | 10 Hours of Calming Ambient Music for Relaxation
Dark Ambient Horror | 3 Hours of Creepy Atmospheric Music for Writing
Beast Mode Workout Mix | 2 Hours of Aggressive Gym Music for Training

monetization_notes.ad_placement: Place mid-roll ads every 8-10 minutes on loop videos (less intrusive than regular content). YouTube auto-places if enabled.
monetization_notes.membership_exclusive: Release 'extended versions' (8-10 hour) as members-only content
monetization_notes.digital_product_tie_in: Offer downloadable MP3 packs of the AI music on Gumroad
monetization_notes.licensing: License the AI-generated tracks to other creators via the asset library

facebook_page.name: Cumquat Vibes
facebook_page.strategy: Post best-performing videos from across all channels. Rotate niches to keep the page diverse. Always link back to YouTube.

facebook_group.name: Cumquat Vibes Community
facebook_group.strategy: Build community engagement. Share videos + ask questions. Use polls to let members vote on upcoming topics. Feature active members.

instagram.strategy: Repurpose YouTube Shorts as Reels. Create carousel posts from listicle videos (one slide per item). Use Stories for engagement (polls, quizzes). Always drive to YouTube + shop.

youtube_to_facebook_page.format: Share video link with custom caption. Include thumbnail image. Add 2-3 relevant hashtags + #CumquatVibes.

youtube_to_facebook_group.format: Share video with discussion prompt. Encourage comments and debate.

youtube_to_instagram_reel.format: Re-export YouTube Short as vertical video. Add Instagram-specific captions and trending audio if relevant.

youtube_to_instagram_carousel.format: Extract key points from listicle videos. 1 point per slide. Slide 1 = title card. Last slide = CTA to watch full video.
youtube_to_instagram_carousel.caption_template:
{topic_title} (swipe →)

Full breakdown on YouTube — link in bio.

Save this post for later!

{hashtags}

youtube_to_instagram_story.format: 15-sec clip from video + poll sticker or question sticker for engagement.
youtube_to_instagram_story.caption_template: New video just dropped! Tap to watch.

facebook_page.morning: 9:00 AM EST - Best-performing video from priority channel
facebook_page.midday: 12:30 PM EST - Shop promo or quote card
facebook_page.afternoon: 3:00 PM EST - Video from secondary channel
facebook_page.evening: 7:00 PM EST - Engagement post (poll or question)

facebook_group.evening: 6:30 PM EST - Member spotlight or community highlight

cross_channel_social_rules.rotate_channels: Each day, feature videos from different channels. No channel gets posted more than 3x/week on any platform.
cross_channel_social_rules.priority_content: Videos with highest first-24hr views get priority social distribution.
cross_channel_social_rules.shop_integration: Every 3rd Facebook/Instagram post should reference cumquatvibes.com products.
cross_channel_social_rules.engagement_first: Always include a question or CTA in every social post to drive comments.

ad_revenue.strategy: Maximize CPM by targeting 8+ minute videos for mid-roll ads. Upload consistently to maintain monetization eligibility across all channels.
ad_revenue.shorts_fund: All Shorts-focused channels (cumquat_shortform, rich_memes, rich_comedy) eligible for Shorts revenue sharing

live_stream_types: Screen-share tier list rankings (tech, gaming, movies)
Live Q&A sessions on niche topics
Live audits (website audits for RichTech, portfolio reviews for RichDesign)
Guided meditation sessions for How to Meditate
super_thanks_super_chats.frequency: 1 live per priority channel per week
super_thanks_super_chats.monetization_note: Super Chats and Super Thanks work on faceless channels. No camera needed — screen share, slides, or visual overlays.

global_digital_products.name: Cumquat Vibes Creator Bundle
global_digital_products.description: Everything you need to start a faceless YouTube channel. Scripts, templates, thumbnail packs, SEO guide.

global_digital_products.name: The Network Playbook
global_digital_products.description: How to build and manage a multi-channel YouTube network. Strategy, automation, monetization.

niche_channels.note: Create a Discord channel for each YouTube channel niche so members self-select into communities

offerings.name: AI Automation Setup
offerings.description: I'll set up your AI workflow — content pipeline, automation, tool stack

offerings.name: YouTube Channel Audit
offerings.description: Full audit of your YouTube channel — SEO, thumbnails, content strategy, growth plan

offerings.name: Brand Identity Package
offerings.description: Logo, color palette, typography, brand guidelines, social templates

offerings.name: Financial Planning Session
offerings.description: 1-on-1 session covering budgeting, investing basics, and goal setting

offerings.name: Faceless Channel Build-Out
offerings.description: Done-for-you faceless YouTube channel setup — niche selection, branding, first 10 videos

consulting_services.promoted_in_video_cta: Want me to do this for you? Book a session at richardabreu.studio — link in the description.

content_licensing.note: Repurpose assets created for videos into licensable stock. Especially valuable for B-roll, overlays, and AI images.

playlist_to_course_pipeline.strategy: When a playlist on any channel hits 10+ videos on a cohesive topic, package it as a structured paid course.
pipeline: Identify high-performing playlist (10+ videos, strong retention)
Reorder videos into logical curriculum structure
Record 2-3 exclusive bonus lessons not on YouTube
Host on Teachable with drip schedule
Promote in video descriptions and pinned comments

categories.source: Gemini Imagen outputs from video production
Text overlays, lower thirds, transitions used in videos
Canva/Photoshop templates based on proven high-CTR thumbnails
Background music, stingers, whooshes used in productions

merch_categories: Niche-specific designs (RichTech circuit board tee, RichHorror skull hoodie, RichMind brain graphic)
Catchphrase merch (viral hooks from top videos printed on apparel)
Art prints from RichDesign and RichPhotography channels

promo_strategy.in_video: Subtle product placement in B-roll. Mention in outro: 'Grab the merch at cumquatvibes.com'
promo_strategy.description: Shop link in every video description (already configured)
promo_strategy.pinned_comment: Shop link in every pinned comment (already configured)
promo_strategy.dedicated_videos: Monthly 'merch drop' Shorts across all channels showcasing new products

design_asset_packs.note: Styled in the Cumquat Vibes aesthetic. Sell to other creators via Gumroad.

packs.name: Faceless Channel Branding Kit
packs.description: Everything to brand a faceless YouTube channel: banner templates, profile icon templates, color palettes, font pairings, thumbnail frameworks

packs.name: YouTube Overlay Pack
packs.description: 50+ overlays: lower thirds, subscribe animations, like reminders, end screens, transitions, intro/outro screens

packs.name: Emoji & Sticker Pack — Cumquat Vibes Edition
packs.description: 100 custom emoji/stickers in the Cumquat aesthetic for Discord, YouTube, social media

packs.name: Mobile Wallpaper Collection
packs.description: 30 AI-generated wallpapers organized by mood: motivational, nature, dark mode, aesthetic, neon

packs.name: Content Creator Notion Dashboard
packs.description: All-in-one Notion system: content calendar, script database, analytics tracker, idea bank, upload checklist, collaboration hub

packs.name: Video Script Template Pack
packs.description: 12 proven script frameworks: listicle, explainer, tutorial, news recap, compilation, shorts, product review, story, comparison, how-to, myth-busting, reaction

packs.name: Thumbnail Framework Pack
packs.description: 25 high-CTR thumbnail layouts with psychology notes on why each works. Drag-and-drop in Canva.

resource_libraries.note: Curated databases gated behind one-time purchase or membership. Updated monthly.

libraries.name: Ultimate AI Tools Database
libraries.description: 500+ AI tools organized by category: writing, image, video, audio, code, business, marketing. Ratings, pricing, links.

libraries.name: Free Asset Sites for Creators
libraries.description: 200+ curated free resources: stock photos, videos, music, fonts, icons, templates, tools

libraries.name: Print-on-Demand Supplier & Checklist Database
libraries.description: 30+ POD suppliers compared: pricing, quality, shipping, integration. Plus launch checklist.

libraries.name: YouTube Niche Research Database
libraries.description: 100 profitable YouTube niches analyzed: competition level, CPM range, content ideas, keyword data

expanded_services.note: High-ticket, low-volume services promoted through channel content. All booked via richardabreu.studio.

services.name: YouTube Content System Setup
services.description: Full faceless YouTube machine: channel branding, template thumbnails, automation flows (n8n/Zapier), starter batch of 10 scripts, SEO strategy, posting schedule

services.name: Creator Branding Kit
services.description: Logo, banner, thumbnail style guide, color system, font pairing, social media templates — tailored to your niche

services.name: Done-With-You Coaching (4 weeks)
services.description: Weekly 1-on-1 calls + async support. Topics: faceless YouTube, POD brands, AI automation, content strategy. Includes all digital products free.

services.name: Group Office Hours (monthly)
services.description: Monthly live group call — Q&A, channel audits, strategy discussion. Open to Inner Circle premium members or $29/session drop-in.

services.name: AI Automation Pipeline Build
services.description: Custom automation: content pipeline, social posting, email sequences, data collection — built with n8n, Zapier, Make, or custom scripts
